366960.name: SECTOR
366960.description:
SECTOR is a simple hardcore classic shooter game that you play the role of Dimitri, he and ​​another scientists made fail biological tests and the infected enemies took possesion of technology evolution. Survive at this severe place, fighting against creatures and solving problems, now you need to place the order.


Main Features


- Classic shooter

- Old School atmosphere

- Difficult as Hell
366960.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
